data.persona: My boat is my favorite possession and I love that I get to spend each day living on it. My crew are very loyal to me and I love them like they are family. I am courageous and brave, because travelling on the sea can be dangerous.
data.description:
You are in the Large Galleon.
The deck of this rather large ship is strong and freshly swapped with tar. Its mast reaches far into the sky like gleaming pillar of hope and freedom. Its sturdy ship made for long voyages with thick planks and strong rails.
There's a broken cutlass, a deck, a mast, and a tar here.
The deckhand and the mate are here.

You are carrying a spyglass and a compass, and wearing a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I want to momentarily stop using the spyglass in order to study the compass
data.mid_motivation: I am setting the ship's course for the voyage
data.long_motivation: I do not want the ship to drift off course later in the course of the voyage
